verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tomoera aminay, Tompo
Mba hamonjy anay,
Fa ilay fahavalonay
Masiaka, mifofo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ry hazavana doria,
Ny taratrao anie
Hitombo ho lehibe
Hitsilo soa ny dia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Raketo aty aminay
Ny Teny masinao,
Ka ny fampianaranao
No ho fiainanay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ny ela-pamonjenao
No hanomba anay,
Ka enga anie izahay
Hiadana aminao.
